definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The Q is - do you mean Pluto in its aphelion or perihelion ?
sentences.chinese: 我的問題是，冥王星此時是在近地點還是遠地點？

sentences.english: The time between two passages at the perigee (of the Moon).
sentences.chinese: 月球連續兩次經過近地點所需的時間。

sentences.english: At its closest, the moon is said to be at perigee.
sentences.chinese: 相反，當它運行到最近的位置時，那就叫近地點。

sentences.english: A The ellipse has a semimajor axis A, -2a perigee to apogee-- is 2a.
sentences.chinese: 橢圓軌道半長軸爲，近地點到遠地點。

sentences.english: This phenomenon is called "lunar perigee", or "SuperMoon".
sentences.chinese: 這一現象被稱爲”月球近地點”或”超級月亮”。
